name: EloR
description:
Made for Chillennium game jam 2017 by Team 42, "Get the Thing", including Dylan Burton, Taylor Hobbs, Phuong Huynh, and Yamen Al Masalmeh.

EloR is envious of all the fun the players get to have playing games. Now, it wants to turn the tables and have you control the game. Place 3 different control pads to tell eloR what to do in this spoopy reverse-platformer.
